Entries.{{ModId}}_Ollivander05:
none/8 17/farmer 7 17 1 HogwartsOllivander 9 17 3/skippable/pause 800/
        question null "#None of these wands are working."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "Despite years of experience, wandmakers never know how wands will react.#$b#However, what we have agreed upon is that the wand chooses the wizard."/pause 800/
        question null "#Yes, Mr. Ollivander... #I’ve heard of your shop in Diagon Alley, but you have a shop here now?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "I opened this branch after... I was taken from my shop, and haven’t returned... #$b#So, I came here to Hogsmeade. Quainter. Safer. A place to forget.#$b#I have this locket to help me get through. It’s a painting of my daughter."/pause 800/
        question null "#Is your daughter in London?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "Sadly, she has passed."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 28/pause 800/
        question null "#If you can come, every week, Mrs. Granger hosts a support group for victims of Voldemort."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "We do not speak his name..."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 16/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "#$b#Would you be able to come back another time?"/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_Ollivander15:
none/8 17/farmer 7 17 1 HogwartsOllivander 9 17 3/skippable/pause 800/
        question null "#Mr. Ollivander? Sir?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "Oh, I didn't hear you. Forgive me. I was deep in thought."/pause 800/
        question null "#Are you alright sir? #You seem fatigued."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "This wand of yew... it is quite unlike any other."/pause 800/
        question null "#I saw that. That was... extraordinary. #I've never seen such potency from a charm."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "This wand... it elevates me. Every memory of hate, this wand turns it into power, #$b#and I have had tremendous power lately."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 8/pause 800/
        question null "#Be careful. This intensity... it’s affecting you. #Some power isn't meant to be wielded."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "Wands are meant to be wielded, and I intend to wield this one."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 40/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
